title: Combine Mary and Mark to find market demand

content.description: The graphs above show Mary’s demand for hamburgers and Mark’s demand for hamburgers. Suppose Mary and Mark are the only two consumers in the market.
content.question: Which of the following is a point on the market demand curve for hamburgers?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
